title: bullrun2024bro
author: bullrun2024bro
content: Does anyone know of a provider that provides free (1) and no monthly delay (2) data on corporate insider purchases or sales?According to the old saying of Peter Lynch:Quote"Insiders might sell their shares for any numbers of reasons, but they buy them for only one: they think the price will rise."they are a pretty good indicator for future trends. I am looking something like this:Source: https://twitter.com/investmattallen/status/1621225968219078656Unfortunately I can not find the original source of the screenshot. So if anyone knows anything, feel free to link it here. Thanks a lot in advance.

Thanks a lot in advance.It came from one of sentimentrader's monthly subscriber services:  https://sentimentrader.com/pricingSample data:  https://www.facebook.com/sentimentrader/photos/a.988852947969805/2083590145162741/While there are resources for tracking insider data. I think they are delayed by a period of time making the data less useful for investment purposes. In the past there were threads made in this section of the forum noting a trend where new index funds planned to emulate insider trading data. Without much follow up, unfortunately.Can't comment on this from experience. Its possible someone could use the info to build a good trading strategy around the information. It is possible people are already doing it.
